name: Stellar Echoes
description:
Stellar Echoes is a sci-fi space adventure and exploration VR game developed by 8 people from the team of Shanghai Liyin in 6 months. In this game, players play the role of a brave space agent, driving a spaceship appointed by the Immigration Administration to go to the planet at cosmic coordinate LY-1119 in order to collect unknown energy resources that landed on this planet. As the mission progresses, the truth behind the mysterious energy would be gradually unfolded throughout the gameplay.
Gameplay in VR
The first release is an early access version of the SE series’ first season. Players can fully immerse themselves into the hyper-real space of the future by using VR equipment. There are many interesting interactions can be found within the spaceship, trying to use your both hands to grasp the way to explore. On the target planet, players can choose stealth, close combat, and long-range shooting to carry out the adventure.
This is the first time we make a complete game, thus there are still many details and areas need to be improved in the future updates. We would appreciate it if players could kindly bear with us as our team will continuously work on game defects. Please stay in touch with our team on the Steam platform, and SE series will definitely be better with the help of your valuable suggestions.
